text: An attitude of philosophic doubt, of suspended judgment, is repugnant to the natural man. Belief is an independent joy to him.
author: William Minto

text: Even when I'm playing someone named Fat Amy, I'm all about confidence and attitude.
author: Rebel Wilson

text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

text: To love beauty is to see light.
author: Victor Hugo

text: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.
author: Amanda Peet
